
---
title: 'LCD 小屏狂喜：iPhone SE 3 手机发布 3 个月直降 1000 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/2435b28f-bbda-4698-bf28-9edcbb734ad0.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 06 Jun 2022 02:02:58 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/2435b28f-bbda-4698-bf28-9edcbb734ad0.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="5ae6">iPhone SE 3 手机发布于 3 月 9 日，该机搭载 A15 仿生芯片，支持 5G，搭配 4.7 英寸 LCD 屏幕，发售价为：64GB 版本 3499 元；128GB 版本 3899 元；256GB 版本 4699 元。</p><p data-vmark="1f63"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/2435b28f-bbda-4698-bf28-9edcbb734ad0.png" alt="iPhone SE 3" title="LCD 小屏狂喜：iPhone SE 3 手机发布 3 个月直降 1000 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="ffe5">京东 618 大促期间，<span class="accentTextColor">开通 A + 会员</span>，全系直降 1000 元，64GB 版本 2499 元；128GB 版本 2899 元；256GB 版本 3699 元：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANsJK1olXDYCVV9cC04RAmkOH1slGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXgMEVVhbDEsIWipURmt0ORwKMARZQS5zWxp-e15VD25jKFs9BEcnAG4KH1oUXgcCU25eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsFQIgZhZLBBc4G14lC2gCVV9cCUoWA2wOK1sWWgIAUVZcAEMnA2gMHl4cXAUDVVpUAHsXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnA18LKwV7XFUEVl5YD095XmoLGBlIXVJsVF5bDE4TBGgPK1kUXAQAZG4" data-jdid="100024707751">点击查看</a>。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="e548">A + 会员：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPIJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwJkUAlbayJxczd1axxDFFECHDkKbzhjBj9WaEVNAlNWHUEETRdKDQFNWUkLbV5-CBgdDVEXZg1qe1lMNRgDESRcVQ0bD18IGVsdXgcKVVxeOEgVBG0OH14WWjZhMzAcVDZ5XjMPY2sVXDZJOl9tCE8SBmYJG1MSWzYCU1pYDUIWAWsIGVMSbQYKU24BShlWQV84K1glbTYDZF1tViUWUGgNElsWX2hfUV1eTw5DWgEIG10dXgUAVFxtCkoWAW04Kw" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPEJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwJkUAlbayJxczd1axxDFFECHDkKbzhjBj9WaEVNAlNWHUEETRdKDQFNWUkLbQd1XSMWVwp1Zi0PZhhdQ15EEhsafQ0bD18NGl8UWDYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7HFp_OgMBDzMnAW4NGlodbU1sVW5dC0wTAW4NHV0RbQYFUFtYAUoVB28PHVklXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQcyV24DZkpEBGoAGlJHM1sHV10aTRcVbW8IHVwdVQIFXG5fCUoVAV84" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BAPEJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwJkUAlbayJxczd1axxDFFECHDkKbzhjBj9WaEVNAlNWHUEETRdKDQFNWUkLbURQNSUndwBWYSt-eFNvH15-DwEtaA0bD18NGlIdVAMDVVptC0kQAWkMHlgSbWVlOh8BdSVKX2hwK1sQbU1sVW5dC0oVBW8PG1MdbQYFUFtYAUoVB28OHlwlXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQcyV24DZkpEBGxbGFwVM1sHV10aTRUVbW8IHVITXA8LV25fCUoVAV84%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此开通</a>。</p></li></ul><p data-vmark="ad6b">*A + 会员需要京享值≥6000 有机会开通，开通后可享受 618 专享价、原厂维修 5 折、原厂配件 94 折券、App Store 97 折充值卡等服务。暂时无法开通的小伙伴可以点击预约 99 元开通按钮，待满足资格会有通知提示开通。</p><p data-vmark="c484"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/95a859dd-2b85-48e7-acf9-80ad0a9ca09a.png" alt="iPhone SE 3" title="LCD 小屏狂喜：iPhone SE 3 手机发布 3 个月直降 1000 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="6f96">还可叠加京东无门槛红包，每天抽三次，即抽即用：<a href="https://u.jd.com/JwxmjrY" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://u.jd.com/JLx5OnY" data-iosurl="https://u.jd.com/JIxhk9h" data-androidurl="https://u.jd.com/Jwx5L6v" data-uwpurl="https://u.jd.com/JKx5Sow" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252fu.jd.com%252fJC4tJ53%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此抽红包</a>。</p><p data-vmark="f255">外观方面，iPhone SE 3 延续了 <a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone SE 2</a> 的设计，采用航空级铝金属搭配玻璃材质，支持 IP67 级防水与 Touch ID，搭配 4.7 英寸屏幕，拥有午夜色、星光色和红色三种配色可选。</p><p data-vmark="0e1d">配置方面，A15 仿生芯片搭载 6 核中央处理器，由 2 个高性能核心和 4 个高能效核心构成。同时 16 核神经网络引擎每秒可进行 15.8 万亿次运算，能加快第三方应用的机器学习运算速度。</p><p data-vmark="3901"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/c6b31146-cb17-408a-b3fa-910a08a0a5dd.png" alt="iPhone SE 3" title="LCD 小屏狂喜：iPhone SE 3 手机发布 3 个月直降 1000 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a7d0">此外，iPhone SE 3 <span class="accentTextColor">配备了 1200 万像素的 ƒ/1.8 光圈广角摄像头</span>，支持智能 HDR 4、摄影风格、深度融合、人像模式等计算摄影功能。IT之家了解到，iPhone SE 3 还支持使用通过 Qi 认证的充电器进行无线充电。</p><ul class="ai-word-checked list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="45ce">此价格购买需要将开通 A + 会员：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPIJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwJkUAlbayJxczd1axxDFFECHDkKbzhjBj9WaEVNAlNWHUEETRdKDQFNWUkLbV5-CBgdDVEXZg1qe1lMNRgDESRcVQ0bD18IGVsdXgcKVVxeOEgVBG0OH14WWjZhMzAcVDZ5XjMPY2sVXDZJOl9tCE8SBmYJG1MSWzYCU1pYDUIWAWsIGVMSbQYKU24BShlWQV84K1glbTYDZF1tViUWUGgNElsWX2hfUV1eTw5DWgEIG10dXgUAVFxtCkoWAW04Kw" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAPEJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwJkUAlbayJxczd1axxDFFECHDkKbzhjBj9WaEVNAlNWHUEETRdKDQFNWUkLbQd1XSMWVwp1Zi0PZhhdQ15EEhsafQ0bD18NGl8UWDYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7HFp_OgMBDzMnAW4NGlodbU1sVW5dC0wTAW4NHV0RbQYFUFtYAUoVB28PHVklXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQcyV24DZkpEBGoAGlJHM1sHV10aTRcVbW8IHVwdVQIFXG5fCUoVAV84"
